description:
I've always wanted to do a video like this. Two best friends who decide that they would do a side-by-side jerk off. I see other sites make claims but rarely does it strike me as "Authentic", and I wanted it to be a Real situation.
Bryson had fun doing his solo, so he talked his best friend Caden in to coming in and jacking off with him. They've been friends since they were 12, and Caden had only seen Bryson naked once when they tried to film a girl giving Bryson head.
The two are just plain goofy around each other, and I wanted a video where I would leave the camera on while they got geared up and capture that. If you're looking for serious sex, this vids not for you. Half this video is a giant Out Take!
But if you like to watch two straight guys come to terms with the fact they got themselves into a situation that was bound to be awkward and STILL time their cumshots, you will love this video.
My favorite part was asking them at the end who was going to suck who's cock first...hmmm..I wonder if I can talk them in to it?
title: Bryson & Caden - Side-By-Side
